diagnosis.final_diagnosis: obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) with comorbid major depression
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The final diagnosis of OCD with comorbid major depression was made based on the patient's history of obsessive thoughts and compulsive behaviors directly related to her religious practices, along with significant depressive symptoms impacting her quality of life and ability to perform daily tasks. Key evidence included the exacerbation of symptoms after marriage and during pregnancy, as well as a family history of depression.
